data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 1
data.expected_result: Your friends in the friends list should be shown.
data.short_description: Friends list is empty after leaving a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Direct Messages - Open the friends list - Now join any server/or open any existing one - Leave this server
